title: 173. Q&AF: Inter-Relationship Dynamics, Handling Employees & Overcoming Social Awkwardness
itunes:title: 173. Q&AF: Inter-Relationship Dynamics, Handling Employees & Overcoming Social Awkwardness
description: Almost everything in life is achievable if you put your mind to it. In today's episode, Andy answers your questions about why you should invest in yourself first before looking for the ideal partner, ways to build your employees into people of character and how to improve your people skills to be more sociable.
